scenario_text.value: Saki, can I talk with you?
Sure. What is it?
I just wanted to say something. Uh...
(What should I say to Saki?)
I’ll be there for you.
Let’s do this!
I really care for you.
I’ll be there for you.

If you find yourself in trouble out there,
you can count on me. I’ve got your back.
Takuma? What makes you say that?

He’s worried about you, Saki. After all,
you’re such a cutie.

Ah ha ha, now I get it. I’m so cute, you just
can’t help worrying about me.
What? No! I didn’t mean it like that...
Hee hee. Well, thank you.

I’m holding you to that, okay? If something
happens out there, I’ll be counting on you.
Let’s do this!

We’re coming up on the final battle. Let’s
make this happen, Saki!
Yeah, let’s do this, Takuma!
I really care for you.
Saki...I care so much for you.

What?! Takuma, are you seriously confessing
your love to me right now?!
Whoo, whoo! Go, Saki, go!
What? No, I didn’t mean it like that...

It’s not just me, we all care very deeply for
you, Saki. That’s what I wanted to say.

Oh... Oh, okay. So that’s what you meant. You
really had me going there!

That’s really sweet, Takuma. You know I worry
about that kind of thing.

You must have noticed how scared I get that
other people won’t like me.
That’s why you said that, isn’t it?

You don’t have to worry, Saki. Just focus on
the fight, and we’ll definitely make it home.
Yeah, that’s all I wanted to say.
All right. Thanks, Takuma.
Thanks, Takuma.

I’m feeling a lot better now. In fact, I’m
feeling like we can do this!

But some of the others still seem kind of
down. You should talk with them!

You’re right. We want everyone to go into
this feeling positive. I’ll talk with them.

Seriously, I’m all good now! You go on and
check in with the others!
